welcome.title: Hello from VaxSafe AI Assistant!
welcome.description: I will guide you on how to book a vaccination appointment quickly.

step1.title: Step 1: Choose Vaccine
step1.description: First, visit our vaccine list page.

step2.title: Step 2: Search & Filter
step2.description: Use filters to find vaccines by price, country, or name.

step3.title: Step 3: Book Appointment
step3.description: Click the 'Book' button on the vaccine you want to schedule.

step4.title: Step 4: Appointments
step4.description: Track the status and details of your vaccination appointments here.

step5.title: Step 5: Details
step5.description: Review appointment information, payments, and confirmation QR codes.

chatbot.title: AI Health Consultation
chatbot.description: If you need advice on suitable vaccines or have health questions, chat with me right away!
